item.description:
I got this idea from the Friends of the Myles Standish group. I'm just going to do the Reservoir hike because it will be dark and I know that trail best.

The Exact day will be determined the week before so we can get a better indication of the weather. If the nights are clear mabye we'll do 2 nights. I.e. Thurs & Sat.

This was a great time. I hope many of you can join us.

Please dress for the cold.

Bring a flashlight. Nothing too bright.

 

The Apres-hike festivities will be at the Little Red Smokehouse if anyone cares to join us there.

It's about a 3.2 mile loop. It took us about an hour and a half the first time we did it at night.

FYI - the moonrise calender

http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/astronomy.html?n=2406&month=1&year=2013&obj=moon&afl=-11&day=1
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the Ranger Station Parking Lot - I'm sure we'll be the only nuts there.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Full Moon Hike - Jan 24 - Thursday !
